summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: TAKIYA 72pcs Mixed Assorted Style Full Cover Acrylic False Artificial Nail Tips (3 Boxes，Not Includes Glue)
Review Date: 2018/12/17
Average Rating: 3.2
Product Details: {'Size': 'Large', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Style': 'French', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.06 x 6.65 x 1.06 inches; 2.54 Ounces'}
Review Text: These are very thin and cheap. Even the designs rub off within a day or two. When I wore the first pair pair I thought it might just be a fluke that they kept breaking off and the design came off. So, I tried a second set. The same thing happened. Just tossed the 3rd set.
Review Title: Don't waste you money!
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Kiss Gel Fantasy Ready-to-Wear Gel 24 Nails KGN53 Olivia (2 Pack)
Review Date: 2019/01/24
Store: KISS
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Size': '2 Pack', 'Material': 'Gel', 'Brand': 'KISS', 'Style': 'Art Deco', 'Pattern': 'Solid', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.63 x 4.53 x 1.89 inches; 2.36 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Ivy Enterprises, Inc.'}
Review Text: Great nails. The best brand I have found. I wear them all of the time. If taken care of they will last about a week. I have found that if you put a top coat or clear polish on top the color doesn't wear off the tips as much adding to the lasting color. I used to do my own nails but got tired of having to wait for the polish to dry especially when in a hurry. These you can put a drop or so of glue and they stay on without damaging your nails. I wear gloves when I do the dishes and clean so they last long. I get compliments all of the time.
Review Title: Great nails!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: YVVO Fake Nails Nail Art Manicure - Full Cover Short Pattern Violet False Nails with Rotating Solution pressure Pink Diamond Clover Decor - Complete Nail Beauty Trimmer/File/Glue/Cleaner Cotton Pads S
Review Date: 2019/05/02
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.8 x 3.31 x 0.83 inches; 2.57 Ounces', 'UPC': '634923438611'}
Review Text: These are beautiful! And the case they come in is really nice and can be used again and again!
Review Title: Beautiful Nails!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Gold Finger Full Cover Nails Gel Glam Ready to Wear Gel Manicure Long Nails (2 PACK)
Review Date: 2019/07/27
Store: KISS
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Material': 'Gel', 'Brand': 'KISS', 'Style': 'French', 'Pattern': 'Solid', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5.5 x 2.75 x 2 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'GFC02'}
Review Text: These are just as bright as in the pictures which I absolutely love! Excellent quality! Will be ordering again!!
Review Title: Beautiful Nails!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
**Preferences and Patterns Summary:**

- **Brand Loyalty**: Predominantly favors KISS branded products, indicating a strong preference for their quality and design.
- **Quality and Durability**: Generally seeks long-lasting and visually appealing false nails but has experienced disappointment with lower quality alternatives.
- **Styles**: Shows a preference for French style and solid patterns, favoring simplicity and elegance in nail design.
- **Material Preference**: Prefers gel-based nail products over acrylic, highlighting a trend towards comfort and a more natural look.
- **Usage Context**: Uses false nails for everyday wear, mentioning practical needs such as easy application and durability during activities like washing dishes.
- **Positive Reinforcement**: Regularly expresses satisfaction when products meet or exceed expectations; detailed experiences with compliments suggest a social aspect to their purchases.
- **Feedback Patterns**: Mixed responses to various products, with high ratings for KISS nails but significant dissatisfaction with other brands, driving home the importance of brand reliability in their purchasing decisions.

target_interaction.title: Not for thin hair
target_interaction.text: I love all of the colors. I can wear 2 different colors at the same time to go with different outfits . The only thing is if you hair very thin hair they will not stay in place. They will slip off. I have found that if I use hairspray when wearing these it kind of helps with that.
target_interaction.title_meta: CoverYourHair Colorful Plastic Headbands- Bulk Headbands (36 Pack Thin Headbands) - Hard Headbands - Hair Accessories
features: This Party Pack of 36 Skinny Headbands is a Great Hair Accessory Set and Perfect to Share with Friends
These Headbands are Ideal for a Slumber Party or Birthday Overnight. They Make Great Party Favors for Girls of All Ages
These Comfortable Headbands Keep Your Hair Back and Away from Your Face. Wear Your Hair Loose or in a Pony for Casual or Elegant Occasions
These Flexible Plastic Headbands with Inner Teeth are Super Skinny, Just .6 cm wide and Comfortable for Every Day Wear
The Pack of Vibrant Colors Includes Six Red, Six Purple, Three Pink, Six Light Blue, Three Black, Three White, Three Yellow, Three Orange and Three Green Headbands. One Size Fits Most
